*https://www.percona.com/doc/percona-server/LATEST/installation/yum_repo.html
*https://www.opencli.com/linux/centos-7-install-percona-server
<br>
*找到預設密碼 -> ``>emi9#+w8n/J``

```
more /var/log/mysqld.log | grep password
```
```
[root@chttl ~]# grep "password" /var/log/mysqld.log 
2019-03-27T08:14:51.230382Z 1 [Note] A temporary password is generated for root@localhost: >emi9#+w8n/J
```






*https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.6/en/information-schema.html

!!! *預設資料庫
---
*information_schema
>提供資料庫名稱、表格名稱、欄位資料型態與存取全線等資訊
>有時被稱為Data Dictionary 或 System Catalog
*mysql
>包含使用者使用權限等資料
*Performance_schema (~MySQL 5.5以後)
>蒐集資料庫性能參數

|表格名稱|功能|用法|h
|Schemeta|資料庫資訊|SHOW DATABASES|
|Table|表格資訊|SHOW TABLES|
|columns|欄位資訊|SHOW COLUMNS FROM [tablename]|

*建立測試表
```sql
use test;
create table if not exits customer(
id int,
name varchar(50),
gander varchar(1),
address varchar(200) 
) 
```
*查詢information_schema
```sql
SHOW DATABASES;
SHOW TABLES;
SHOW COLUMNS FROM 'customer';
```
*查詢資料庫資訊 (test資料庫)
```sql
select * 
from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.SCHEMATA
where SCHEMA_NAME = 'test';
```
*查詢資料表資訊(customer資料表)
```sql
select * 
from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
where table_name = 'customer';
```
*查詢欄位資訊(test 資料庫customer資料表的 name 欄位)
```sql
select * 
from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
where column_name = 'name'
and table_name = 'customer'
and table_schema = 'test'
```
*合併表格與欄位資訊
```sql
select tb.table_name, col.COLUMN_NAME
from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES tb 
        inner join
        INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS col
             on tb.table_schema = col.table_schema
           and tb.table_name     = col.table_name
where tb.table_name= 'custormer' and tb.table_schema = 'test';
                                                 


```






*http://fecbob.pixnet.net/blog/post/39094997-mysql%E8%A8%B1%E5%8F%AF%E6%AC%8A%E7%9A%84%E8%A9%B3%E7%B4%B0%E8%A7%A3%E7%AD%94
*使用者權限儲存於mysql資料庫
|表格名稱|權限範圍|h
|user|全域|
|db|資料庫|
|tables_priv|表格|
|columns_priv|欄位|
*查詢現在登入使用者
```sql
select user();
select session_user();
select system_user();

+----------------+
| user()         |
+----------------+
| root@localhost |
+----------------+
1 row in set (0.00 sec)

```

*查詢使用者資訊
```sql
select User, Host, Password from user;
```
```
mysql> select User, Host, Password from user;
+------+-----------+-------------------------------------------+
| User | Host      | Password                                  |
+------+-----------+-------------------------------------------+
| root | localhost | *84BB5DF4823DA319BBF86C99624479A198E6EEE9 |
| root | 127.0.0.1 | *84BB5DF4823DA319BBF86C99624479A198E6EEE9 |
| root | ::1       | *84BB5DF4823DA319BBF86C99624479A198E6EEE9 |
+------+-----------+-------------------------------------------+
```
*新增使用者
```sql
use mysql;
create user 'test'@'192.168.56.254' identified by 'test';
```
*刪除使用者
```sql
drop user 'test';
flush privileges;
```
---
!!!*權限設定
*https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.6/en/grant.html
*檢視權限表
```sql
show privileges;
```

*賦予權限
```sql
#給予app使用者hsunite資料庫GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, CREATE, ALTER, EXECUTE, SHOW VIEW的權限
GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, CREATE, ALTER, EXECUTE, SHOW VIEW ON `hsunite`.* TO 'app'@'%'

flush privileges;
```
```sql
#新增test使用者並給予所有權限
grant all privileges on *.* to 'test'@'%' identified by 'testPassword' with grant option;

flush privileges;
```
```sql
#新增tset2使用者並給予select mysql.user 權限
grant select on mysql.user to 'test'@'localhost' identified by 'testPassword' with grant option;

flush privileges;
```
*查詢權限

```sql
show grants for 'test'@'%';
```
```sql
select user,table_name, grantor, table_priv, column_priv 
from tables_priv 
where user = 'test';
```

*查詢所有權限種類
```
show privileges;
```

*回收權限
```sql
#回收 tset2 select mysql.user 權限
grant select on mysql.user from 'test'@'localhost'
```







*登入
```
mysql -u <<登入帳號>> -p [-p <<登入ip>>]
#如果要直接登入，密碼不另外打，-p後面直接輸入密碼
```
```
mysql -u root -pPassword -h 127.0.0.1 
```
*系統狀態
```sql
mysql>status
```
*系統Process
```sql
mysql>show processlist;
#或
mysql>show full processlist;
```
*權限機制
```
1.檢查是否有連入server 權限
2.檢查request 對db是否有足夠的權限(select, insert, update, delete)
```
*賦予權限
```sql
mysql>
grant select,insert,update,delete on db_name.* to user_name@'10.%' identified by 'password';
```
*移除權限
```sql
mysql>
revoke select,insert,update,delete on db_name.* from user_name@'10.%'
```






*效能調教
https://blog.toright.com/posts/4912/%E6%B7%BA%E8%AB%87-mysql-%E6%95%88%E8%83%BD%E9%81%8B%E4%BD%9C%E6%A9%9F%E5%88%B6.html






*官方文檔
*https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.6/en/server-system-variables.html
----
*windows 設定檔
|File Name|Purpose|h
|%WINDIR%\my.ini, %WINDIR%\my.cnf|Global options|
|C:\my.ini, C:\my.cnf|Global options|
|BASEDIR\my.ini, BASEDIR\my.cnf|Global options|
|defaults-extra-file|The file specified with --defaults-extra-file, if any|
|%APPDATA%\~MySQL\.mylogin.cnf|Login path options (clients only)|
|DATADIR\mysqld-auto.cnf|System variables persisted with SET PERSIST or PERSIST_ONLY (server only)|
*linux 設定檔
|File Name|Purpose|h
|/etc/my.cnf|Global options|
|/etc/mysql/my.cnf|Global options|
|SYSCONFDIR/my.cnf|Global options|
|$MYSQL_HOME/my.cnf|Server-specific options (server only)|
|defaults-extra-file|The file specified with --defaults-extra-file, if any|
|~/.my.cnf|User-specific options|
|~/.mylogin.cnf|User-specific login path options (clients only)|
|DATADIR/mysqld-auto.cnf|System variables persisted with SET PERSIST or PERSIST_ONLY (server only)|

*mysql 實際檔案位置
```
預設/var/lib/mysql
實際位置參考 /etc/mysql 裡的 my.cnf「datadir」 的參數設定
```

*優化設定
```
my.cnf:
[client]
default-character-set = utf8mb4

[mysql]
default-character-set = utf8mb4

[mysqld]
#default-timezone='+8:00'
explicit_defaults_for_timestamp=true
skip-name-resolve
innodb_buffer_pool_size = 64M
max_connections = 200
bind-address = 0.0.0.0
character-set-server = utf8mb4
collation-server = utf8mb4_unicode_ci
init-connect = 'SET NAMES utf8mb4'
skip-character-set-client-handshake
wait_timeout = 150
innodb_file_per_table = 1
#innodb_file_format = Barracuda
innodb_flush_method = O_DIRECT
innodb_log_file_size = 5M
innodb_buffer_pool_size = 10M
expire_logs_days = 1
max_binlog_size = 5M
open_files_limit = 40960
slow_query_log = 1
slow_query_log_file = /var/log/mysql/slow.log
long_query_time = 2
log-queries-not-using-indexes
```








*官方文檔
*https://dev.mysql.com/doc/
----
*http://www.mysqltutorial.org/






```sql
SELECT CONCAT('ALTER TABLE ',table_name,' ENGINE=InnoDB;') 
From information_schema.tables 
WHERE table_schema='dbname' AND ENGINE='myisam';
```






*查看現在執行狀況
```sql
show processlist;
or
show all processlist;

```

*開啟 slow query log, 儲存執行慢的 ~MySQL 語句
```
要紀錄執行慢的 SQL 語句, 可以透過修改 my.cnf 完成, my.cnf 多數在以下位置:
/etc/my.cnf
/etc/mysql/my.cnf
```
```
#開啟紀錄執行慢的 SQL 語句
slow_query_log = 1

#設定紀錄檔的位置在 /var/log/mysql-slow.log
slow_query_log_file = /var/log/mysql-slow.log

#設定當 SQL 語句執行時間超過 2 秒時, 便會將 SQL 語句儲存
long_query_time = 2

#修改好 my.cnf 後, 重新啟動 MySQL 便完成了。
```
*查詢資料表大小 

```sql

use information_schema;

select table_name, concat(round(sum(data_length/1024/1024),2),'MB')
from tables where table_schema='fubon'
group by table_name
order by sum(data_length/1024/1024) desc;

```

```

+--------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------+
| table_name                     | concat(round(sum(data_length/1024/1024),2),'MB') |
+--------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------+
| log_sms                        | 649.05MB                                         |
| log_vpn                        | 574.23MB                                         |
| log_SonicWALL                  | 71.26MB                                          |
| se_firewall_policy_detail      | 17.76MB                                          |
| log_SonicWALL_bak20160308      | 12.49MB                                          |
| se_mac_address_table           | 9.28MB                                           |
| log_vpn_login                  | 2.96MB                                           |
+--------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------+
```

*釋放硬碟空間(單純delete不會釋放空間要用OPTIMIZE)
```sql
mysql> OPTIMIZE TABLE table_name;
```






|資料庫|<|h
|切換資料庫|''use'' mysql;|
|使用root登入|mysql -u ''root'' -p<br>>輸入密碼|
|取消命令|\c or Esc|
|列出所有資料庫|show database''s'';|
|列出所有資料庫|select ''database()'';|
|新增一個名為db1的資料庫(預設字元使用utf-8)|create database db1 character set utf8;|
|刪除名為db1的資料庫|drop database db1;|
|設定權限|<|h
|新增使用者user01密碼password 有mysqldb資料庫的所有權限(by 密碼為增帳號使用，已存在帳號可不用，單純給予權限)|''grate'' ''all'' on ''mysqldb.*'' to user01@"localhost" indentified  by "password"|
|賦予user01 有從10.2.11.246登入 mysqldb資料庫tab1資料表的select權限|''grate'' ''SELECT'' on ''mysqldb.tab1'' to ''user01''@''"10.2.11.246"'' |
|資料表|<|h
|show tables;|顯示該資料庫所有資料表|
|新增資料表student (id 為自動增量數字 且為 主鍵,name 為一般文字)|''create table'' student(id int(10) parmary key auto_increment, name varchar(30)) character set utf8;|
|顯示create table student 語法(G代表關鍵字大寫，可不填)|''show'' create table student\G|
|資料表-insert|<|h
|塞入''一筆'' 資料 欄位:name 內容:sam|''insert into'' student(name) values('sam')|
|塞入''多筆'' 資料 |''insert into'' student(name,age) values('sam',18),('bob',19),('john',20)|
|刪除資料表student|''drop table'' student;|
|備份還原|<|h
|將db1資料庫匯出至 d:/db1.sql (user:root 密碼:1234)|''mysqldump'' -uroot -p1234 db1 > d:/db1.sql |
|其他|<|h
|查看之前語法|F11|
|查看資料庫版本|show ''version()''|
|''if(判斷式,true的返回值,false返回值)''|select ''if(''sex==1,"男生","女生"'')''|
|字串相加 ''concat(字串1,字串2,字串3)''|select ''concat(''"男生","愛","女生"'')'' , 結果=>男生愛女生 |
|顯示''字元''長度|select ''length(''"盾"'')'' |
|顯示''字數''|select ''char_length(''"盾"'')'' |
|md5加密|select ''md5''("1234")|
|顯示table1 欄位屬性|''desc'' table1;|
|執行d:/test.sql內命令 |''source'' d:/test.sql |

*其他參考
*http://note.drx.tw/2012/12/mysql-syntax.html

----
*編碼

|show character set;|顯示所有''定序'' ，utf8_general_ci:不分大小寫，utf8_bin:區分大小寫|
|show colloction|顯示預設"定序",ex.設定utf8 -> 預設 utf8_general_ci (不分大小寫)|
```
【欄位】指定了編碼utf8 沒指定定序 -> 編碼utf8
【欄位】指定了定序 沒指定編碼 -> 使用定序 utf8_bin utf8
【欄位】沒指定了定序 沒指定編碼 -> table 預設定序及編碼
【table】沒指定 -> 【DB】預設
【DB】沒指定 -> mysql 預設

```
```
show variables like "%character%"
show variables like "%collation%"

character_set_client | big5
character_set_connection | big5
character_set_result | big5

character_set_database | blatin1 當前DB編碼
character_set_filesystem | binary 文件系統編碼

character_set_server | latin1 預設server編碼
character_set_system | utf8 系統編碼

set name utf8->
character_set_client | utf8
character_set_connection | utf8
character_set_result | utf8

client(big5)->connection(big5)->field(utf8)->result(utf8)

```
*避免PHP SQL Injection
```php
$db = newsqli("localhost","host","","webclass");
$uname = $_GET['uname'];
$password  = $_GET['password'];
if(!get_mageic_quotes_gpc()){
   $uname == addslashes($uname);
   $password = addslashes($password);
}

$charset = "set character_set_connection=utf8,character_set_results=utf8
,character_set_client=binary";
$db->query($charset);
```


*CUDR
*http://note.drx.tw/2012/12/mysql-syntax.html






1.修改設定檔

```
#/etc/my.cnf 加入
skip_grant_tables
```
```
   [mysqld] 
    skip-grant-tables 
```
2.服務重啟候登入

```
[root@localhost ~]# systemctl restart mysqld
[root@localhost ~]# mysql

mysql>
```
3.更改密碼

```
mysql> use mysql;
mysql>  update user set Password=password('密码') where  user='root' ;
Query OK, 3 rows affected (0.00 sec)
Rows matched: 3  Changed: 3  Warnings: 0

mysql> exit;
Bye

```
4.修改設定檔

```
#/etc/my.cnf 移除
skip_grant_tables
```
5.服務重啟候登入

---

*單純修改密碼後可執行``flush privileges;``
*刷新~MySQL的系統權限相關表­(不用重啟服務)






*先查詢帳號
```sql
use mysql;
select user,host from user;
```
```
mysql> select user,host from user;
+---------------+-----------+
| user          | host      |
+---------------+-----------+
| mysql.session | localhost |
| mysql.sys     | localhost |
| dbadmin       | localhost |
+---------------+-----------+
3 rows in set (0.00 sec)
```
!!''*修改密碼''

----
*【方法一】
```sql
USE mysql;
 
UPDATE user 
SET password = PASSWORD('dolphin')
WHERE user = 'dbadmin' AND 
      host = 'localhost';
 
FLUSH PRIVILEGES;
```
*~MySQL 5.7.6+
```sql
USE mysql;
 
UPDATE user 
SET authentication_string = PASSWORD('dolphin')
WHERE user = 'dbadmin' AND 
      host = 'localhost';
 
FLUSH PRIVILEGES;
```
----
*【方法二】
```sql
	
SET PASSWORD FOR 'dbadmin'@'localhost' = PASSWORD('bigshark');
```
*~MySQL 5.7.6+
```sql
SET PASSWORD FOR 'dbadmin'@'localhost' = bigshark;
```
----
*【方法三】
```sql
ALTER USER dbadmin@localhost IDENTIFIED BY 'littlewhale';
```
*參考網站
*http://www.mysqltutorial.org/mysql-changing-password.aspx






*密碼強度不足-處理方法
```
ERROR 1819 (HY000): Your password does not satisfy the current policy requirements.
```
*修改強度等級
```
mysql> set global validate_password_policy=0;
```
*修改長度限制(預設8碼)
```
mysql> set global validate_password_length=3;
```
*https://blog.vvtitan.com/2018/04/mysql%E6%9B%B4%E6%94%B9%E5%AF%86%E7%A2%BC%E9%A1%AF%E7%A4%BA%E3%80%8Cerror-1819-hy000-password-satisfy-current-policy-requirements%E3%80%8D%E9%8C%AF%E8%AA%A4%E8%A8%8A%E6%81%AF%E7%9A%84%E8%99%95/






https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.7/en/mysqldump.html

!! 使用 mysqldump 匯出資料

----
*匯出整個資料庫(含資料庫中的資料）
```
mysqldump -u {username} -p {dbname} > dbname.sql
```
|``--all-databases``|匯出所有資料庫|
|``--no-data``|不匯出資料|
|``--routine``|匯出 stored routines (預存程序) 和自訂函數|
|``--single-transaction``|該選項從伺服器轉儲數據之前發出一個BEGIN SQL語句|
|``--skip-lock-tables``|不鎖定 table (資料表)|
|``--trigger``|匯出 trigger (觸發器)|

*匯出資料庫結構（不含資料）
```
mysqldump -u {username} -p -d {dbname} > dbname.sql    
```

*匯出資料庫中指定的資料表（含資料）
```
mysqldump -u {username} -p {dbname} {tablename} > tablename.sql    
```
*匯出資料庫中的某張資料表的表結構（不含資料）
```
mysqldump -u {username} -p -d {dbname} {tablename} > tablename.sql
```
!!使用 SQL command 還原資料
----
*如要對資料進行還原，可執行如下命令：
```
mysql -u {username} -p {trget_db} < backup_db.sql    
```
*也可以到mysql command 裡面直接值型>
```
mysql> backup_db.sql    
```






!!! *''建立資料庫''
```sql
create database newdb;
```
```sql
create database newdb default charset utf8;
```
|character_set_database|資料庫字元編碼|/etc/my.cnf|
|collection_database|資料庫定序|/etc/my.cnf|
!!! *''檢視資料庫''
*檢視資料庫資訊
```sql
use newdb;
select database();
```
*檢視character_set 及collection
```sql
show variables like 'character_set_database';
show variables like 'collection_database';
```
*檢視資料庫建立語法
```sql
show create database newdb;
```
*查看所有character_set 及collection
```sql
SHOW CHARACTER_SET;
SHOW COLLECTION;
```






|數字|>|
|tiny|-128~127|
|smallint|-32768~32767|
|mediumint|-8388608~8388607|
|int|-2147483648~2147483647|
|bigint|-9233372036854775808~9233372036854775807|
|float||
|double||
|decimall(M,N)|M:整數位,N:小數位|
|二進制|>|
|binary||
|varbinary||
|blob||
|文字|>|
|char||
|varchar||
|text||








*儲存引擎比較
|特性|~InnoDB|~MyISAM|MEMORY|h
|transession|``支持``|無|無|
|儲存限制|64TB|有|有|
|空間使用|高|``低``|``低``|
|記憶體使用|高|``低``|高|
|讀寫速度|低|``高``|``高``|
|foreigen key|``支援``|無|無|
|鎖級別|row|table|table|
|熱備份|``支援``|無|無|






*關閉
```
SET SQL_SAFE_UPDATES=0
```
*開啟
```
SET SQL_SAFE_UPDATES=1
```






```
 case 【判斷變數】
	when【判斷式】 then 【執行動作】
        .......
        else 【執行動作】
        end case;

```
```sql
drop procedure if exists p5;
delimiter $
create procedure p5()
begin
	
    declare pos int default 0;
    set pos = floor(5*rand());
    
    case pos 
	when 1 then select 'still flying';
        when 2 then select 'fall in sea';
        when 3 then select 'in the island';
        else select 'I dont know';
        end case;
    
end$

#測試
call p5(); 
```






*語法 
*初始資料生成參考 [[MySQL_StoredProcedure]]
```sql
   declare done int default 0;
   declare 【cursor名】cursor for 
		要查詢的語法.....
    declare exit handler for not found set done := 1;

    open 【cursor名】;
		       
		repeat
		fetch getgoods into 【變數一】,【變數二】,【變數三】....;
			主要執行的sql......
		until done = 1 end repeat;
        
    close 【cursor名】;
```
*範例(理解用，正式請看下一個)
```sql
drop procedure if exists testCursor;
delimiter $
create procedure testCursor()
begin

    declare row_gid int;
    declare row_name varchar(20);
    declare row_num int;
    declare count int;
    declare i int default 0;
    	
    declare getgoods cursor for select * from goods;
    
		select count(*) into count from goods;
            
    open getgoods;
		       
		repeat
		fetch getgoods into row_gid, row_name, row_num;
			set i := i + 1; 	
			select row_gid, row_name, row_num;
		until i >= count end repeat;
        
    close getgoods;

end$
#測試
call testCursor();
```
*使用 exit(continue) handler 監控指標到底
```sql
drop procedure if exists testCursorHandler;
delimiter $
create procedure testCursorHandler()
begin

	declare row_gid int;
    declare row_name varchar(20);
    declare row_num int;
    declare done int default 0;
		
    declare getgoods cursor for 
		select gid, `name`, num  from goods;
    declare exit handler for not found set done := 1;
	#declare continue handler for not found set done := 1; #會有多出一行錯誤，注意exit handler 跟 continue handler 差別 
	
    open getgoods;
		       
		repeat
		fetch getgoods into row_gid, row_name, row_num;
			select row_gid, row_name, row_num;
		until done = 1 end repeat;
        
    close getgoods;

end$
call testCursorHandler();

```
*改用while
```sql
drop procedure if exists testCursorHandlerWhile;
delimiter $
create procedure `testCursorHandlerWhile`()
begin

	declare row_gid int;
    declare row_name varchar(20);
    declare row_num int;
    declare done int default 0;
		
    declare getgoods cursor for 
		select gid, `name`, num  from goods ;
    declare exit handler for not found set done := 1;
	
    open getgoods;
    
		while done = 0 do 
			fetch getgoods into row_gid, row_name, row_num;
			select row_gid, row_name, row_num;
        end while;
        
    close getgoods;

end$
```

*安裝
https://www.phpini.com/linux/centos-7-install-phpmyadmin

```
/etc/httpd/conf.d/phpMyAdmin.conf
```
```
<Directory /usr/share/phpMyAdmin/>
   AddDefaultCharset UTF-8

   <IfModule mod_authz_core.c>
     # Apache 2.4
     <RequireAny>
       Require ip 127.0.0.1
       Require ip 1.34.132.154
       Require ip ::1
     </RequireAny>
   </IfModule>
   <IfModule !mod_authz_core.c>
     # Apache 2.2
     Order Deny,Allow
     Deny from All
     Allow from 127.0.0.1
     Allow from 1.34.132.154
     Allow from ::1
   </IfModule>
</Directory>

```
*設定-連線遠端
https://www.albert-yu.com/2017/10/%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8phpmyadmin%E9%81%A0%E7%AB%AF%E6%93%8D%E4%BD%9Cmysql/

```
/etc/phpMyAdmin/config.inc.php
```
```
$i++;
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['host']          = '178.128.31.156';
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['port']          = '1433';         
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['socket']        = '';         
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['connect_type']  = 'tcp';      
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['extension']     = 'mysqli';   
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['compress']      = FALSE;      
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['controluser']   = '';        
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['controlpass']   = '';        
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['auth_type']     = 'cookie';   
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['user']          = '';         
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['password']      = '';         
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['only_db']       = '';        
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['hide_db']       = '';         
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['verbose']       = '';  
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['pmadb']         = '';         
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['bookmarktable'] = '';        
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['relation']      = '';        
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['table_info']    = '';        
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['table_coords']  = '';        
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['pdf_pages']     = '';        
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['column_info']   = '';         
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['history']       = '';          
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['verbose_check'] = TRUE;                           
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['AllowRoot'] = TRUE;       
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['AllowDeny']['order'] = '';
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['AllowDeny']['rules'] = array();
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['AllowNoPassword'] = FALSE;      
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['designer_coords'] = '';         
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['bs_garbage_threshold'] = 50;         
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['bs_repository_threshold'] = '32M';      
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['bs_temp_blob_timeout'] = 600;        
$cfg['Servers'][$i]['bs_temp_log_threshold'] = '32M';   
```






```
repeat
     ......執行內容
until 【判斷式符合 離開】 end repeat; 
```
```sql
drop procedure if exists p6;
delimiter $
create procedure p6()
begin
	
    declare total int default 0;
    declare i int default 0;
    
    repeat
    set i := i +1;
    set total := total + i;
    until i >= 100 end repeat;
    
    select total;
end$

#測試
call p6(); 
```






*mysql沒有row_number 函數，所以使用一些小技巧來取代
*宣告變數 
```sql
SET @row_number = 0;
 
SELECT 
    (@row_number:=@row_number + 1) AS num, firstName, lastName
FROM
    employees
LIMIT 5;
```
*不宣告變數
```sql
SELECT 
    (@row_number:=@row_number + 1) AS num, firstName, lastName
FROM
    employees,(SELECT @row_number:=0) AS t
LIMIT 5;
```
[img [img|img/2019/mysql-row_number-session-variables.jpg]]

```sql
SELECT 
    @row_number:=CASE
        WHEN @customer_no = customerNumber THEN @row_number + 1
        ELSE 1
    END AS num,
    @customer_no:=customerNumber as CustomerNumber,
    paymentDate,
    amount
FROM
    payments
ORDER BY customerNumber;
```
[img [img|img/2019/mysql-row_number-per-group.jpg]]

*參考網站
*http://www.mysqltutorial.org/mysql-row_number/






```
mysql> show variables like '%safe_updates%';
+------------------+-------+
| Variable_name    | Value |
+------------------+-------+
| sql_safe_updates | ON    |
+------------------+-------+

1 row in set (0.00 sec)
```
在Safe Update Mode開啟的狀態下，在沒有 WHERE 或 LIMIT 條件的 UPDATE 或 DELETE 動作會拒絕執行，而即使是有 WHERE 和 LIMIT 條件，但''沒有 KEY column'' 的 WHERE 條件也會拒絕執行。

 

要關閉Safe Update Mode 可執行 ``SET SQL_SAFE_UPDATES=0`` 指令：

```sql
SET SQL_SAFE_UPDATES=0

```
要再開啟Safe Update Mode，就執行 ``SET SQL_SAFE_UPDATES=1``即可開啟

```sql
SET SQL_SAFE_UPDATES=1

```






*取得欄位註解
```sql
SHOW FULL FIELDS FROM 資料庫名稱.資料表名稱
```
*取得資料表註解
```sql
-- 資料表註解
select table_schema, table_name, table_comment
from information_schema.tables
where table_schema='資料庫名稱';
-- 資料欄位註解
select table_name, column_name, column_type, column_key, extra, column_comment,ordinal_position
from information_schema.columns
where table_schema='資料庫名稱';
```

*合併查詢
```sql
use mysql;
select 
              b.table_name
            , a.table_comment
            , b.column_name
            , b.column_type
            , b.column_key
            , b.extra
            , b.column_comment
            , b.ordinal_position
from
(
        -- 資料表註解
        select table_schema, table_name, table_comment
        from information_schema.tables
        where table_schema='hsunite'
) a left join
(
        -- 資料欄位註解
        select table_name, column_name, column_type, column_key, extra, column_comment, ordinal_position
        from information_schema.columns
        where table_schema='hsunite'
) b on a.table_name = b.table_name

```






|show procedure status; |顯示所有storedprocedure|
|call procedure名|呼叫storedprocedure|
*語法
```sql
create procedure [name]( in/out/inout [參數名] [參數類型])
begin
    內容.....
end
```
*範例
```sql
drop procedure if exists p1;

delimiter $
create procedure p1()
begin
	select "aaaa" from dual;
end$

#測試:
call p1();
```
*in 參數型
```sql
drop procedure if exists p2;
delimiter $
create procedure p2(in in_height int)
begin
	declare age int default 18;
	declare username varchar(50) default "Sam" ;
	set age := age + 20;
    
	select concat(username,":","20年後年齡為:",age,",身高",in_height) as result from dual;
end$

#測試:
call p2(180);   #Sam:20年後年齡為:38,身高180
```
* in ,out 參數型
```sql
drop procedure if exists p3;
delimiter $
create procedure p3(in in_startInt int,in in_endInt int,out out_total int)
begin
	declare tmp_Num int default 1;
        set out_total := 1;
	
	while in_startInt < in_endInt do
		
        set tmp_Num	:= tmp_Num + 1 ;
		set in_startInt := in_startInt + 1;
		set out_total := out_total + tmp_Num;
       
         end while; 
    
    #select out_total from dual;
end$

#測試:
call p3(1,100,@aaaa); 
select @aaaa; #5050
```
*inout型參數
```sql
drop procedure if exists p4;
delimiter $
create procedure p4(inout age int)
begin
	set age := age+20 ;
end$

#測試:
set @age := 18;
call p4(@age); 
select @age as age; #38
```
*Case
```sql
drop procedure if exists p5;
delimiter $
create procedure p5()
begin
	
    declare pos int default 0;
    set pos = floor(5*rand());
    
    case pos 
		when 1 then select 'still flying';
        when 2 then select 'fall in sea';
        when 3 then select 'in the island';
        else select 'I dont know';
        end case;
    
end$

#測試
call p5(); 
```






|show triggers;|顯示trigger|
|drop tirggers triggername;|刪除trigger|
|drop trigger if exists tr_addgoods;|如果trigger "tr_addgoods" 存在就刪除|
*用法
```sql
delimiter $
create trigger t1
after / before
insert / update / delete 
on table1
for each row 
begin 
        sql1 ......
        sql 2.................
end$
```
*注意庫before,after使用時機
```sql
delimiter $
create trigger t1
before
insert [update | delete ]
on table1
for each row 
begin 
        sql1 ......
        sql 2.................
end$
```
*範例
* 準備相關資料
```sql
drop database if exists testDB;
show databases like 'testDB';
create database testDB char set utf8;
use testdb;

drop table if exists goods;
create table goods (

	gid int,
    name varchar(20),
    num smallint
);

insert into goods values(1,'cat',34),(2,'dog',65),(3,'pig',21);

drop table if exists ord;
create table ord(
	oid int auto_increment,
    gid int,
    much smallint,
    primary key(oid)
);

```
*  trigger 內容
```sql
#新增時觸發
drop trigger if exists tr_addgoods;
delimiter $
create trigger tr_addgoods
after
insert
on ord
for each row
begin
	update goods set num = num-new.much where gid=new.gid ;
end$
```
```sql
#刪除時觸發
drop trigger if exists tr_delgoods;
delimiter $
create trigger tr_delgoods
after
delete
on ord
for each row
begin
	update goods set num = num+old.much where gid=old.gid ;
end$
```
```sql
#修改時觸發
drop trigger if exists tr_editgoods;
delimiter $
create trigger tr_editgoods
before
update
on ord
for each row
begin
	update goods set num = num + old.much - new.much where gid=old.gid ;
end$
```
*測試語法
```sql
insert into ord(gid,much) values (2,3);
select * from goods;
select * from ord;

delete from ord where oid = 2;
select * from goods;
select * from ord;

update ord set much = 1 where oid = 3; 
select * from goods;
select * from ord;
```






*新增一個使用者 killme, 密碼設定為 killpwd, 並且給予資料庫的所有權限
```sql
use mysql;
INSERT INTO user(host,user,password) VALUES('%','killme',password('killpwd'));
GRANT ALL ON *.* TO 'killme'@localhost IDENTIFIED BY 'killpwd' WITH GRANT OPTION;
FLUSH PRIVILEGES;
```
*如果要給予使用者特定資料庫的操作權限可以這麼做
```sql
GRANT SELECT,INSERT,UPDATE,DELETE,CREATE ON dbname.* TO 'killme'@localhost IDENTIFIED BY 'killpwd';
```






```
while 【判斷條件符合 進入迴圈】 do
       ......執行內容		
       end while; 
```
```sql
drop procedure if exists p3;
delimiter $
create procedure p3(in in_startInt int,in in_endInt int,out out_total int)
begin
	declare tmp_Num int default 1;
        set out_total := 1;
	
	while in_startInt < in_endInt do
		
        set tmp_Num	:= tmp_Num + 1 ;
		set in_startInt := in_startInt + 1;
		set out_total := out_total + tmp_Num;
       
         end while; 
    
end$

#測試:
call p3(1,100,@aaaa); 
select @aaaa; #5050
```






```
DbSqlEditor:LastDefaultSchema=hsunite
lastConnected=1547747017
serverVersion=5.1.73
```






egrep






```bash
server {
    # 設定 Listen 的 port
    listen 80 default_server;

    # 設定服務主機名稱
    server_name hs-ha.com;

    # 設定網站根目錄路徑
    root "/var/www/hsunite/public";

    # 設定讀取檔案優先順序
    index index.php index.html index.htm;

    # 設定網站編碼
    charset utf-8;

    location / {
        try_files $uri $uri/ /index.php?$query_string;
    }

    location = /favicon.ico { access_log off; log_not_found off; }
    location = /robots.txt  { access_log off; log_not_found off; }

    access_log off;
    # 設定 Log 路徑
    error_log  /var/log/nginx/kejyun.dev-error.log error;

    sendfile off;

    client_max_body_size 100m;

    # 設定 php 檔案處理方式
    location ~ \.php$ {
        fastcgi_split_path_info ^(.+\.php)(/.+)$;
        fastcgi_pass 127.0.0.1:9000;
        fastcgi_index index.php;
        include fastcgi_params;
        fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME $document_root$fastcgi_script_name;

        fastcgi_intercept_errors off;
        fastcgi_buffer_size 16k;
        fastcgi_buffers 4 16k;
        fastcgi_connect_timeout 300;
        fastcgi_send_timeout 300;
        fastcgi_read_timeout 300;
    }

    location ~ /\.ht {
        deny all;
    }
}

```    






*不同於browser
**No DOM
**No document
**No window
**having globale
**having process 
```
process.env
process.stdin
process.pid 
process.cwd
```
*use ``require`` to import modules
```
 const http = require('http'); 
```
*3 type of modules:
>* core module - require('http')
>*File module - require('../lib/myFile')
>*Insalled module - requre('express') 
>**Local node_modules folder: ``npm install``
>**Global module folder: ``npm install -g``

*[[NodeJs_install]]
*[[NodeJs_create_server]]







```
const http =require('http');
http.createServer((request, response) ={
.....
}).listen(8080);
```






```
npm i tape faucet
```






*``npm``:NPM 是 Node Package Manager 的簡稱，它是一個線上套件庫，可以下載各式各樣的 Javascript 套件來使用
----
*建立 package.json 紀錄安裝套件(-y: 不詢問直接使用預設值)
```bash
npm init -y
```
*安裝套件，如jquery (--save 代表會寫入package.json 檔)

```bash
npm install jquery -D
```
>*https://docs.npmjs.com/cli/install

```
#參數
-P, --save, --save-prod:  設定存入 dependencies 區塊
-D, --save-dev:  設定存入 devDependencies 區塊
```

*就會在``專案目錄``/``node_modules``/``套件名稱`` 看到安裝套件，通常會在``dist``目錄找到js
[img[img/2019/npm_install-jquery.png]]

*建立.gitignore排除套件資料夾 ``node_modules``
[img[img/2019/npm_use-gitignore.png]]
*當你從網路下載專案，要先安裝各種套件，
執行``npm install``就可根據package.json安裝所需套件

```bash
npm install
```
*參考資料:
*[[從零開始: 使用NPM套件|https://medium.com/html-test/%E5%BE%9E%E9%9B%B6%E9%96%8B%E5%A7%8B-%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8npm%E5%A5%97%E4%BB%B6-317beefdf182]]






!''*Kotlin'' 
*~NullSafety
**可以為``null`` -> 使用``?``
```javascript
class Student{
    //如果null 要給初始值
    var name : String? = ""

}
fun main() {
    val stu = Student()
    //可能為null ,name後面要加？
    println(stu.name?.length)
}
```
*~ElvisOperator
*?: ``如果為null則為後面的值``
```javascript
fun strLenSafe(s: String?): Int = s?.length ?: 0

fun main(args: Array<String>) {
    println(strLenSafe("abc")) //3
    println(strLenSafe(null))    //0
}
```
*~SafeCast ``as?``
```javascript
 val otherPerson = o as? Person ?: return false
```
*let
```javascript
fun sendEmailTo(email: String) {
    println("Sending email to $email")
}

fun main(args: Array<String>) {
    var email: String? = "yole@example.com"
    //do sendEmailTo
    email?.let { sendEmailTo(it) }
    email = null
    //do  nothing
    email?.let { sendEmailTo(it) }
}
```

**不可已為``null`` -> 使用``!!``
----
!''*Swift''
*Optional
**可以為``nil`` -> 使用``?``
```javascript
class Student{
    var name:String?
}
var stu = Student()
print(stu.name?.count)
```
**不可已為``null`` -> 使用``!``
```javascript
class Student{
    var name:String!
}
var stu = Student()
//不為null ,name後面不需要加任何東西
print(stu.name.count)
```

*Root Disk 已安裝好作業系統的disk
```
#驗證登入
[root@controller ~]# source keystonerc_admin

#列出所有project(找出ID)
[root@controller ~(keystone_admin)]# openstack server list --all-project

#列出某VM資訊，找到在哪一台compute
[root@controller ~(keystone_admin)]# openstack server show cfcddd51-cee0-409e-b006-ad4a2701213e
+-------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| Field                               | Value                                                    |
+-------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+
| OS-DCF:diskConfig                   | AUTO                                                     |
| OS-EXT-AZ:availability_zone         | nova                                                     |
| OS-EXT-SRV-ATTR:host                | compute1                                                 |
| OS-EXT-SRV-ATTR:hypervisor_hostname | Compute1

#連線至compute node
[root@controller ~(keystone_admin)]# ssh compute1

#列出vm相關資料
[root@compute1 ~]# ls /var/lib/nova/instances/cfcddd51-cee0-409e-b006-ad4a2701213e
console.log  disk  disk.info

```

```
glance image-list
glance image-download --file cirros.
glance help image-create
```

```
#下載
wget 172.24.0.2/images/web.vmdk

#轉檔
qemu-img convert -f vmdk -O qcow2 web.vmdk -c -p web.qcow2

#建立image
glance image-create --name "SAMINAGE" --file web.qcow2 --container-firnat bare --progress
```

!!!''設定檔''
*keystonerc_admin
```
unset OS_SERVICE_TOKEN
export OS_USERNAME=admin
export OS_PASSWORD=openstack
export OS_AUTH_URL=http://192.168.122.20:5000/v2.0
export PS1='[\u@\h \W(keystone_admin)]\$ '

export OS_TENANT_NAME=admin
export OS_REGION_NAME=RegionOne
```

*keystonerc_demo
```
unset OS_SERVICE_TOKEN
export OS_USERNAME=demo
export OS_PASSWORD=d7fbf36cd5364da0
export PS1='[\u@\h \W(keystone_demo)]\$ '
export OS_AUTH_URL=http://192.168.122.20:5000/v2.0

export OS_TENANT_NAME=demo
export OS_IDENTITY_API_VERSION=2.0

```

|主要模組|說明|基本啟動需要|h
|[[HORIZON|OPENSTACK_HORIZON]]|Dashboard 儀表板|是|
|[[NEUTRON|OPENSTACK_NEUTRON]]|Network Management網路管理|是|
|[[NOVA|OPENSTACK_NOVA]]|conpute management模組運算(開虛擬機)|是|
|[[KEYSTON|OPENSTACK_KEYSTON]]|驗證與授權|是|
|[[GLANCE|OPENSTACK_GLANCE]]|Image Management映像檔管理|是|
|[[CINDER|OPENSTACK_CINDER]]|volume 管理|是|
|[[SWIFT|OPENSTACK_SWIFT]]|物件儲存|``否``|

|其他模組|<|h
|HEAT|自動佈件|
|TROV|資料庫管理|
|SAHARA|~BigData管理|
|IRONIC|實體機部署|

|雲端分類|<|h
|~IaaS|Infrastructure as a Service|
|~PasS|Platform as a Service|
|~SaaS|Software as a Service|
|~DBaaS|Database as a Service|
|~FWaaS|Firewall as a Service<br>Virtual route 對Virtual route|
|~VPNaaS|VPN as a Service|
|~LBaaS|Load-Balacing as a Service|

*overflow:hidden 
*使用 ``overflow：hidden`` 隱藏溢出
*使用 ``overflow：hidden`` 清除浮動
*解除margin坍塌([[margin collapse|margin_collapse]])
https://juejin.im/post/5b63ce1351882519a426a12e












*PHP閉合標籤''?>''在PHP中對PHP的分析器是可選的。 但是，如果使用閉合標籤，任何由開發者，用戶，或者FTP應用程序``插入閉合標籤後面``的``空格``或``空行``都有''可能會引起多餘的輸出''、''php錯誤''、''之後的輸出無法顯示、空白頁''。因此，所有的php文件應該省略這個php閉合標籤，並插入一段註釋來標明這是文件的底部並定位這個文件在這個應用的相對路徑。這樣有利於你確定這個文件已經結束而不是被刪節的。

*只有在php代碼''后面需要寫html''的``才使用閉合標籤``。






*逐步提昇PHP技術能力
*https://ithelp.ithome.com.tw/users/20000108/ironman/690
*PHP最佳實踐
*http://www.ruanyifeng.com/blog/2010/12/php_best_practices.html
*PHP之道
*http://laravel-taiwan.github.io/php-the-right-way/#books
*寫給朋友的 PHP 從 0 到 100 實戰教程 系列
*https://ithelp.ithome.com.tw/users/20107394/ironman/1332
*Clean Code PHP
*https://github.com/jupeter/clean-code-php
*Awesome PHP
*https://github.com/ziadoz/awesome-php

*header()
```php
< ?php 
//重定向瀏覽器 
//方法一
header("Location: https://tw.yahoo.com"); 
//確保重定向後，後續代碼不會被執行 
exit;
?>
```
```php
<?php
//方法二：同下面meta
//停留3秒，轉往c.php
header("Refresh: 3; url=c.php")
?>
```
*meta ( ''content'' : 控制秒數轉跳)
```php
<?php   

$url = "https://tw.yahoo.com"; 
?> 
<html>   
<head>   
<meta http-equiv="refresh" content="1;url=<?php echo $url; ?>">   
</head>   
<body> 
一秒頁面轉跳
</body>
</html>
```
*javascript (''window.location.href'')
```php
<?php  
$url = "https://tw.yahoo.com";
echo "<script type='text/javascript'>";
echo "window.location.href='$url'";
echo "</script>"; 
?> 
```






*'~SimpleXMLElement' not found
```
production.ERROR: Class 'SimpleXMLElement' not found
```
>原因：缺少php-xml套件
>解決：安裝php<版本>-php-xml
>如果不確定版本，可以搜尋``yum search php | grep xml``
```
yum install -y php71-php-xml
```
----
*Laravel 
```
production.ERROR: unserialize(): Error at offset 0 of 2 bytes {"exception":"[ob
ject] (ErrorException(code: 0): unserialize(): Error at offset 0 of 2 bytes at /var/www/hsunite/vendo
r/laravel/framework/src/Illuminate/Encryption/Encrypter.php:149)
```
>原因：Laravel 升級加密原則修改
>解決：https://laravel.com/docs/5.6/upgrade#upgrade-5.6.30
```php
// App\Http\Middleware\EncryptCookies
// 加上這行
protected static $serialize = true;
```






``php 5.3.0  以上``

```
<?PHP
	$closure = function($name)
	{
		return sprintf('Hello %s', $name);
	}
	echo $closure("Joho"); //"Hello John"
?>
```






|時間相關|<|h
|time()|時間戳記 |
|date($format,$date)|date ("Y-m-d H:i:s",time()) 列印當前時間|
|密碼相關|<|h
|password_hash()|hash 密碼|
|password_verify()|確認明碼與hash字串|
|move_uploaded_file($file, $dstFolder)|移動上傳檔案至指定路徑|
|realpath($file)|回傳絕對路徑|
|http相關|<|h
|file_get_contents('php:input')|取得post資料|
|parse_str($str,$output_array)|將a=1&b=2轉成[key,value陣列|
|陣列相關|<|h
|array_map($callback_func,$row)|為數組的每個元素應用回調函數<br>ex.''array_map('utf8_encode',$row)''|






*php.ini
```
【POST】
#upload_max_filesize < post_max_size < memory_limit
#上傳大小
upload_max_filesize=2M
#單次POST大小
post_max_size=8M
memory_limit=128M

```






*{{{__DIR__}}}:完整目錄路徑
*{{{__FILE__}}}:完整檔案路徑
*basename():取檔名or當前目錄名
*dirname():上層目錄路徑

```php
<?php
/**
完整檔案路徑
D:\xampp\htdocs\phpSyntaxLab\index.php
*/

echo __FILE__."<br/>";
//D:\xampp\htdocs\phpSyntaxLab\index.php

echo __DIR__."<br/>";
//D:\xampp\htdocs\phpSyntaxLab

echo basename(__FILE__)."<br/>";
//index.php

echo basename(__FILE__,".php")."<br/>";
//index

echo basename(__DIR__)."<br/>";
//phpSyntaxLab

echo basename(__DIR__,"Lab")."<br/>";
////phpSyntax

echo dirname(__FILE__)."<br/>";
//D:\xampp\htdocs\phpSyntaxLab

echo dirname(dirname(__FILE__))."<br/>";
//D:\xampp\htdocs

echo dirname(__DIR__);
//D:\xampp\htdocs
?>
```
*ps.``__DIR__``較``dirname(__FILE)``快了近``五倍``






*PHP_PSR 標準規範
>https://learnku.com/docs/psr
*codeigniter 編碼風格指南
>https://codeigniter.org.tw/user_guide/general/styleguide.html






*http://readily-notes.blogspot.com/2012/05/php-boostrap.html
----

*php檔案上傳大小設定
```bash
[root@www ~]# vim /etc/php.ini
post_max_size = 20M       <==大約在 729 行左右
file_uploads = On         <==一定要是 On 才行 (預設值)
upload_max_filesize = 16M <==大約在 878 行左右
memory_limit = 128M       <==PHP 可用記憶體容量也能修訂！
```






*安裝composer 方法一
```
php -r "copy('https://getcomposer.org/installer', 'composer-setup.php');"

php composer-setup.php --install-dir=/usr/local/bin --filename=composer

php -r "unlink('composer-setup.php');"

```
*安裝composer 方法二
```
#安裝php7.1
sudo yum install php71 -y

sudo curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | sudo php

sudo mv composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer
```
*uninstall composer
```
rm /usr/local/bin/composer
```
----

流程一：新專案流程 ( ``composer install`` )

```
建立 composer.json，並新增依賴到的擴充套件包； 
執行 composer install，安裝擴充套件包並生成 composer.lock； 
提交 composer.lock 到程式碼版本控制器中，如：git;
```
流程二：專案協作者安裝現有專案  ( ``composer install`` )

```
克隆專案後，根目錄下直接執行 
composer install 
從 composer.lock 中安裝 指定版本 的擴充套件包以及其依賴；

此流程適用於生產環境程式碼的部署。
```

流程三：為專案新增新擴充套件包
(``composer require vendor/package``)

```
使用 composer require vendor/package 新增擴充套件包； 

提交更新後的 composer.json 和 composer.lock 到程式碼版本控制器中，如：git;*
```
>https://www.itread01.com/content/1548404107.html






|{{{__LINE__}}}|The current line number of the file.|
|{{{__FILE__}}}|The full path and filename of the file with symlinks resolved. If used inside an include, the name of the included file is returned.|
|{{{__DIR__}}}|The directory of the file. If used inside an include, the directory of the included file is returned. This is equivalent to dirname({{{__FILE__}}}). This directory name does not have a trailing slash unless it is the root directory.|
|{{{__FUNCTION__}}}|The function name.|
|{{{__CLASS__}}}|The class name. The class name includes the namespace it was declared in (e.g. Foo\Bar). Note that as of PHP 5.4 {{{__CLASS__}}} works also in traits. When  used in a trait method, {{{__CLASS__}}} is the name of the class the trait is used in.|
|{{{__TRAIT__}}}|The trait name. The trait name includes the namespace it was declared in (e.g. Foo\Bar).|
|{{{__METHOD__}}}|The class method name.|
|{{{__NAMESPACE__}}}|The name of the current namespace.|






*顯示錯誤訊息(在頁面最上方)
**個別網頁 (參考[[PHP_error_reporting]])
```php
<?php
//設定報錯誤級別
error_reporting(E_ALL);
//設定顯示錯誤
ini_set('display_errors', 'On');
.....
?>
```
**整個網站
>修改php.ini -> 設定display_errors = ``On``
```
sudo vim /etc/php/7.2/apache2/php.ini
```
```
display_errors = On
```
*查看設定
```php
<?php
phpinfo()
?>
```

*var_dump() 
*Xdebug

*http://blog.teamtreehouse.com/how-to-debug-in-php







!!<div style="border-bottom:2px solid #ccc;color:#841;font-weight:bold">*錯誤顯示級別error_reporting</div>
*通常配合 ini_set('display_errors', 'On'); 使用

*錯誤級別
|1|E_ERROR|致命的執行時錯誤。錯誤無法恢復過來。指令碼的執行被暫停|
|2|E_WARNING|非致命的執行時錯誤。指令碼的執行不會停止|
|4|E_PARSE|編譯時解析錯誤。解析錯誤應該只由分析器生成|
|8|E_NOTICE|執行時間的通知。|
|16|E_CORE_ERROR|在PHP啟動時的致命錯誤。這就好比一個在PHP核心的E_ERROR|
|32|E_CORE_WARNING|在PHP啟動時的非致命的錯誤。這就好比一個在PHP核心E_WARNING警告|
|64|E_COMPILE_ERROR|致命的編譯時錯誤。這就像由Zend指令碼引擎生成了一個E_ERROR|
|128|E_COMPILE_WARNING|非致命的編譯時錯誤，由Zend指令碼引擎生成了一個E_WARNING警告|
|256|E_USER_ERROR|致命的使用者生成的錯誤。|
|512|E_USER_WARNING|非致命的使用者生成的警告。|
|1024|E_USER_NOTICE|使用者生成的通知。|
|2048|E_STRICT|執行時間的通知。|
|4096|E_RECOVERABLE_ERROR|捕捉致命的錯誤。|
|8191|E_ALL來|所有的錯誤和警告。|
```php
<?php
//禁用錯誤報告，也就是不顯示錯誤
error_reporting(0);
//報告執行時錯誤
error_reporting(E_ERROR | E_WARNING | E_PARSE);
//報告所有錯誤
error_reporting(E_ALL);
?>
```






* PHP 輸入流 https://note.artchiu.org/2012/05/03/php-%E8%BC%B8%E5%85%A5%E6%B5%81-phpinput/






*https://linuxize.com/post/install-php-7-on-centos-7/

```
sudo yum -y install php71
```
```
sudo yum -y install php71-cli php71-bcmath php71-common php71-devel php71-gd php71-intl php71-json php71-mbstring php71-mcrypt php71-mysqlnd php71-php-pecl-mysql php71-odbc php71-opcache php71-pdo php71-pecl-apcu php71-pecl-igbinary php71-pecl-memcache php71-pecl-memcached php71-pgsql php71-process php71-soap php71-xml php71-xmlrpc php71-zip
```
```
sudo yum -y install  gcc make gcc-c++ git openssl-devel cyrus-sasl-devel php71-fpm install libxml2-devel libcurl libcurl-devel libxslt libxslt-devel libpng libpng-devel libxml2-devel libcurl libcurl-devel libxslt libxslt-devel libpng libpng-devel freetype freetype-devel perl-devel perl-ExtUtils-Embed php71-imap
```






```
class DocumentStore
{
	protested $data=[];
	public function addDocument(DocumentStore $document){
		$key= $document->getId();
		$value = $document->getCcontent();
		$this->data[$key]=$value;
	}
	public function getDocuments(){
		return $this->data;
	}

}
```
```
interface Documentable
{
	public function getId();
	public function getContent();
}
```
*讀取Html
```
class HtmlDocument implements Documentable
{
	protected $url;
	public function _construct($url)
	{
		$this->url=$url;
	}
	public function getId()
	{
		return #this->url;

	}
	public function getContent()
	{
		$ch =curl_init();
		curl_setopt($ch,CURLOPT_URL,#this->url);
		curl_setopt($ch,CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER,1);
		curl_setopt($ch,CURLOPT_COMMECTTMEOUT,3);
		curl_setopt($ch,CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION,1;
		curl_setopt($ch,CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS,3);
		$html =curl_exec($ch);
		curl_close($ch);

		return $hrml;
	}


}
```
*讀取串流
```
class StreamDocument implements Doumentable
{
	protested $resource;
	protested $buffer;

	public function _construct($resource ,$buffer = 4096)
	{
		$this->resource = $resource;
		$this->buffer = $buffer;

	}
	public function getId()
	{
		return 'resource-'.(int)$this-resource;
	}
	public fucntion getContent();
	{
		$streamContent = '';
		rewind($this->resource) === false){
			$streamContent .= fread($this->resource,$this-buffer);
		}
		return $streamContent;
	}
}
```
*讀取串流
```
class CommmandOutputDocument implements Documentable
{
	protected $command;
	
	public function _construct($command)
	{
		$this->command = $command;
		
	}
	public function getId()
	{
		retyn $this->command;
		
	}
	public function getContent()
	{
		return shell_exec($this->command);
	}
}
```
```
<?php
	$documentStore = new DocumentStore();
	
	$htmlDoc = new $HtmlDocument('httpsL//php.net');
	$documentStore->addDocument($htmlDoc);
	
	$streamDoc = new StreamDocument('stream.txt','rb');
	$streamStore->addDocument($streamDoc);
	
	$cmdDoc - new CommandOouputdocument('cat /etc/hosts');
	$cmdStore->addDocument($cmdDoc);
	
	print_r($documentStore->getDocuments);

?>
```












*install
*http://www.lnmp.cn/install-memcache-and-memcached-extends-under-php7.html






*https://github.com/ThingEngineer/PHP-MySQLi-Database-Class






https://incode.pixnet.net/blog/post/39437602






*http://blog.tonycube.com/2016/09/php-psr-4-autoloader.html






```php
include('func.php');
include 'func.php';

require('lib.php');
require('lib.php');

include_once 'mydb.php';
include_once('mydb.php');

require_once 'copyright.php';
require_once('copyright.php');
```
!!<div style="border-bottom:2px solid #ccc;color:#841;font-weight:bold">*require和include的不同</div>
*''require''
>*適合用來引入``靜態``的內容
>*如果include進來的檔案發生錯誤的話，會顯示``警告``，``不會立刻停止``
*''include''
>*則適合用來引入``動態``的程式碼。
 >*而require 則是會顯示``錯誤``，``立刻終止程式``，不再往下執行。

----
*''require_once''和''include_once''
>使用方法跟require、include一樣，差別在於在引入檔案前
>會先''檢查檔案是否已經在其他地方被引入過了''，若有，就不會再重複引入。







*啟用php縮寫
*php.ini
```
short_open_tag = On
```
```php
<?php 
    echo "完整tag, '<?php ?>'";
?>
<? 
    echo "縮寫,不用寫'<?php'" 
?>
```






方法一、修改 php.ini （會影響所有 PHP 程式)

```
[Date]
; Defines the default timezone used by the date functions
date.timezone = Asia/Taipei
```

方法二、使用 date_default_timezone_set

```
date_default_timezone_set('Asia/Taipei');
```

方法三、使用 ini_set （效果同上）

```
ini_set('date.timezone','Asia/Taipei');
```












``php 5.4  以上`` 

*直接擴充類別屬性及方法 方案

```
trait Geocodable
{
	protected $address;
	protected $geocder;
	protected $geocoderResult;
	
	public function setGeocoder(Geocider\GeocoderInterfce $geocoder)
	{
		$this->geocoder = $geocodr;
	}
	public setAddress($address)
	{
		$this->address = $address;
	}
	......
}
```
*注意:類別是use ``外面``，trait是use ``裡面``
```
class MyClass{
     use Mytrait;
    //類別實作 
}
```






*brew install php＠版本
```
brew install php@7.2
brew link php@7.2

#以後要切換版本
brew install php@7.3
brew unlink php@7.2
brew link php@7.3

#以下會提示
echo 'export PATH="/usr/local/opt/php@7.2/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.zshrc
echo 'export PATH="/usr/local/opt/php@7.2/sbin:$PATH"' >> ~/.zshrc
```

*重新載入
```
source ~/.zshrc
```

```
pecl install xdebug
```

```
$ php -m

...
...
[Zend Modules]
Xdebug               <== 成功安裝
Zend OPcache
```







``php 5.5.0  以上``

*壞方法(事先產生大量內容空陣列)
```
<?php
function makeRange($length){
	$dataset = [];
	for ($i = 0 ;$i <$length ;$i ++)
	{
		$datset[$i] = $i;
	}
	return $dataset;
}
```
*好方法
```
<?php
function makeRange($length)
{
	for ($i = 0 ;$i <$length ;$i ++)
	{
		yield $i;
	}
	
}
?>
?>
```
*執行
```
<?PHP
foreach(makeRange(1000000 as $i)
{
	echo $i ,PHP_EOL;
}
?>
```
*CSV產生器
```
function gerRows($file){
	$handle = fopen($file,'rb');
	if ($handle === false)
	{
		throw new Ecxeption();
		
	}
	while(feof($handle) === false)
	{
		yield fgetcsv($handle);
	}
	fclose($handle);
}
foreach (getRows('data.csb') as $row)
{
		print_r($row);
}
```






*設定檔：www.conf
```bash
# find / -name "www.conf"
#CentOS 5
/etc/php5/fpm/pool.d/www.conf
#CentOS 7
/etc/php-fpm.d/www.conf
```
pm:process manager ，負責管理 PHP-FPM 的工作行程
pm 可用的值如下：

|!static|固定行程數量（數量為 pm.max_children|
|!dynamic|動態行程數量（根據 pm.max_children、pm.start_servers、pm.min_spare_servers、pm.max_spare_servers 動態調整|
|!ondemand|動態行程數量（根據 pm.max_children、pm.process_idle_timeout 動態調整）|

```bash
#pm類型
pm = dynamic   
#最大行程數量
pm.max_children = 50
#初始行程數量
pm.start_servers = 5
#最小閒置行程數量
pm.min_spare_servers = 5
#最大閒置行程數量
pm.max_spare_servers = 35
#PHP-FPM 單一行程可處理連線數
pm.max_requests = 500
```

*重新啟動 PHP-FPM 服務
修改好 PHP-FPM 設定檔之後，重新啟動 PHP-FPM 服務，讓新設定生效：

```bash
# PHP 5
sudo systemctl restart php-fpm
# PHP 7
sudo systemctl restart rh-php71-php-fpm
```
檢查 PHP-FPM 是否正常啟動：

```bash
# PHP 5
sudo systemctl status php-fpm
# PHP 7
sudo systemctl status rh-php71-php-fpm
```

*Nginx 與 PHP-FPM 最佳化效能設定教學與技巧
>https://blog.gtwang.org/linux/nginx-php-fpm-configuration-optimization/

```
listen_addresses = '*'
```

```
# IPv4 local connections:
host    all             all             0.0.0.0/0            md5
```

```
//- <h2>plug前處理語言</h2>

  span.small_text 副標題
```

* 安裝 pyinstaller
```
pip install pyinstaller
# 或者
python -m pip install pyinstaller
```
*打包exe
``-F`` 表示打包成單獨的 .exe 檔案<br>
``-i`` 還可以指定可執行檔案的圖示<br>
``-w`` 表示去掉控制檯視窗，這在 GUI 介面時非常有用<br>

```
pyinstaller -F helloworld.py
```
*官網
>https://pyinstaller.readthedocs.io/en/stable/
*參考連結
>https://www.itread01.com/hkiyehk.html

----
當你的程式碼需要呼叫一些圖片和資原始檔的，這是不會自動匯入的，需要你自己手動複製進去才行。不然 exe 檔案執行時命令視窗會報錯找不到這個檔案。

匯入方法：

假設程式中需要引入一個 test.txt 檔案，首先我們執行：

```
pyi-makespec -F helloworld.py
```

此時會生成一個 .spec 檔案，這個檔案會告訴 pyinstaller 如何處理你的指令碼，pyinstaller 建立一個 exe 的檔案就是依靠它裡面的內容進行執行的。

正常情況下你不需要去修改這個 spec 檔案，除非你需要打包一個 dll 或者 so 檔案或者其他資料檔案。

那麼我們就需要修改這個 spec 檔案：

```
a = Analysis(['helloworld.py'],
pathex=['/home/test'],
binaries=[],
datas=[],### <------- 改
```
改為

```
a = Analysis(['helloworld.py'],
pathex=['/home/test'],
binaries=[],
datas=[('test.txt','.')],## <---- 修改此處新增外部檔案
```
然後在生成 exe 檔案：

```
pyinstaller helloworld.spec
```

```
#查看版本

```

```
sudo easy_install pip
```






*''怪異模式''（英語：``quirks mode``）是指在計算機領域中，一些網頁瀏覽器為了維持對較舊的網頁設計的向後兼容性，而使用的一種技術，有別於嚴格遵循全球資訊網聯盟（W3C）與網際網路工程任務組（IETF）標準而設計的「標準模式」。
>https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%80%AA%E5%BC%82%E6%A8%A1%E5%BC%8F

*以下有''DOCTYPE''與''怪異模式''的相關說明
>https://www.cnblogs.com/diligenceday/p/4470813.html







https://www.jianshu.com/p/79ca08116d57

```
#desktop22
hostname: desktop
ip: 172.25.22.10/24

hosts:
172.25.254.254 classroom.example.com
172.25.254.254 content.example.com
172.25.22.10 desktop22.example.com

```
```
#server
hostname:server22
ip: 172.25.22.11/24
gateway 175.25.22.250

hosts:
172.25.254.254 classroom.example.com
172.25.254.254 content.example.com
172.25.22.11 server22.example.com
```

*模擬考試環境(刪除yum,更改密碼,無lab環境可跳過)
```
#rm -rf /etc/yum.repos.d/*
#systemctl set-default multu-user.target
#lab rootpw setup

```
*重設root密碼，恢復開機進入GUI介面，設定Hostname,ip,subnet,gatway,dns

```
*重開機按下【e】，在linux16 .....最後加上 【rd.break】->【Ctrl+X】
#mount -o remount,rw /sysroot
#chroot /sysroot
#passwd 
輸入密碼
#touch /.autorelabel
#exit 
#mount -o remount,ro /sysroot
#exit 
重開機....定使用root登入
#systemctl set-default graphical.target
#systemctl isolate graphical.target
重開機....進入GUI登入
#hostnamectl set-hostname server0.example.com
#hostnamectl 
=>確認【static hostname】
=> or #cat /etc/hostname
開啟network manager GUI 設定網路....
```

*將SELinux開機預設模式設為強制
```
#vim /etc/selinux/config
設定
SELINUX=enforcing

#getinfore
```






*建立用戶群組不管ID，密碼皆為123456
|name|說明|h
|james|manager群組成員|
|mary|manager群組成員|
|sarah|不得登入系統|
```
#groupadd manager
#useradd -G manager james
#passwd james
123456
123456
#useradd -G manager mary 
#passwd mary
123456
123456
#useradd -s /sbin/nologin sarah
#passwd sarah
123456
123456
```
*驗證
```
ssh james@xxx.xxx.xxx.xxxx
輸入密碼
ssh mary@xxx.xxx.xxx.xxxx
輸入密碼
ssh sarah@xxx.xxx.xxx.xxxx
無法登入
```






*將/etc/fstab複製到/var/tmp目錄，使得james用戶對此檔可讀寫，mary用戶無權限
```
#cp /etc/fstab /var/tmp
#setfacl -m u:james:rw /var/tmp
#setfacl -m u:mary:--- /var/tmp
```
*驗證
```
#getfacl /var/tmp
```






*為mary用戶設定排程工作，在每天下午16:30執行``echo "tea time"``
```
#crontab -e
----以下為內容-----
30 16 * * * echo "tea time"

```
*驗證
```
#crontab -l
```






*在/home目錄下建立一個名為【exam】的目錄，將此目錄的群組身分改為【manager】
*屬於manager群組的成員可以進此目錄讀寫
*其他人無權限
*在此目錄生成檔案將會【自動】將群組改為【manager】群組
*【mary】用戶只能【進入】此目錄之後取得【唯讀】權限#
```
#cd /home
#madir exam
#chgrp manager exam/
#chmod 2770 exam/
#setfacl -m u:mary:r-x exam
```






*在系統中找尋屬於【student】的檔案並將其複製到``/root/findfiles``目錄中
```
#mkdir /root/findfiles
#find / -user student -type -f -exec cp {} /root/findfiles/ \;
```
*驗證
```
#ll /root/findfiles/
```






*檔案``/usr/shar/xml/iso-codes/iso_939.xml``中搜尋含有【her】的行，並將這些行的文字輸出到``/root/result.txt``中
```
#grep "her" /usr/shar/xml/iso-codes/iso_939.xml > /root/result.txt
```
*若要完整文字請加上``-w``參數






*建立一個新用戶名為【aruba】，``uid=4003``，密碼為``123456``
```
#useradd -u 4003 aruba
#passwd aruba
123456
123456
```
*驗證
```
cat /etc/passwd | grep aruba
```






*在``/dev/vdb``建立一個768MB的SWAP分割區，並於開機時掛載生效
```
#fdisk /dev/vdb
#p -> n -> enter ->enter ......w
#partprobe
#mkswap /dev/vdb5
#free or #swapon -s =>取得UUID
#vim /etc/fstab
----以下為內容-----
UUID=XXXXXX swap swap default 0 0

```
*驗證
```
#free 
#swapon -s 
```






*將``/usr/local``目錄包裝起來成為一個``local.tar.bz2``檔，並放在``/root``下
```
#cd /root
#tar jcvf local.tar.bz2 /usr/local 
```












*<參考> https://codepen.io/treemanou/pen/XWWMzqv
*html - pug
```
.btnGrey.lg 測試按鈕
.btnYellow.md 測試按鈕
.btnBlack.md 測試按鈕
.btnRed.sm 測試按鈕
```
*SASS
```
//定義變數
$color-red: #ff5151
$color-yellow: #ffdd38
$color-black: black
$color-white: white
$paddingLg: 30px

//可一次輸入兩種值
$paddingMd: 20px 40px
$paddingSm: 10px 20px

//-- 類似funciton 套入管理 css
@mixin button($bg-color:#eee,$font-color:black)
  display: inline-block
  padding: 10px 20px
  background-color: $bg-color
  color: $font-color
  transition: 0.5s
  &.lg
    padding: $paddingLg $paddingLg*2
  &.md
    padding: $paddingMd
  &.sm
    padding: $paddingSm
  &:hover
    background-color: darken($bg-color,9)
  
.btnGrey
  +button

//使用@maxin並輸入變數
.btnYellow
  +button($color-yellow)

.btnBlack
  +button($color-black,$color-white)

.btnRed
  +button($color-red)

```






!!''*CSS的function - ''``@mixin``
----
*常用 mixin
```css
//物件寬高 size(寬度，高度，圓角)
@mixin size($w,$h:$w,$bdrs:0)
  width: $w
  height: $h
  border-radius: $bdrs

@mixin flex($j:center,$a:center)
  display: flex
  justify-content: $j
  align-items: $a

//絕對定位 abpos(left,top)
@mixin abpos($l:initial,$t:initial)
  position: absolute
  left: $l
  top: $t
```

SKS:start-keep-stop

*編譯軟體 - prepros
>https://prepros.io/
*vscode-plugin - ''Live Sass Compiler''
>[[更改輸出資料夾位置|https://medium.com/@enshenghuang/%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8vscode%E5%A4%96%E6%8E%9B%E8%87%AA%E5%8B%95%E7%B7%A8%E8%AD%AFsass-scss-9ff768d23b48]]







*變數
```css
$height :200px;
$font-m: 16px - 3px;
$font-l: $font-m * 1.2;

$font-family-base: “Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif”;

.header{
	height: $height / 4 ;
}

.body{
	font-family: $font-family-base;
}
/***********************************************/
$bgcolor=#008000;
$darken-color: darken($bgcolor,20%);    /** 變亮 20%*/
$lighten-color: lighten($bgcolor,30%);    /** 變暗 20%*/
.box{
	background:$darken-color;
}
.box2{
	background:$lighten-color;
}
```






*VS Code Settings Sync 教學
*https://medium.com/susan-blog/vs-code-settings-sync-%E4%B8%8A%E5%82%B3%E8%A8%AD%E5%AE%9A-4d22deba2185
*https://medium.com/susan-blog/vs-code-settings-sync-%E4%B8%8B%E8%BC%89%E8%A8%AD%E5%AE%9A-9ec248468b53






*首先要關閉splunk服務
```
[root@splunk-server bin]# ./splunk stop
```
*刪除全部索引中的數據,此操作不可逆
```
[root@splunk-server bin]# ./splunk clean eventdata

This action will permanently erase all events from ALL indexes; it cannot be undone.

Are you sure you want to continue [y/n]? y

Cleaning database _audit.

Cleaning database _internal.

Cleaning database _introspection.

Cleaning database _telemetry.

Cleaning database _thefishbucket.

Cleaning database history.

Cleaning database main.

Cleaning database summary.

Disabled database 'splunklogger': will not clean. 
```

3.如果只刪除一個索引中的數據,操作如下

```
[root@splunk-server bin]# ./splunk clean eventdata -index <index_name>
```

4.操作完畢後啟動splunk服務

```
[root@splunk-server bin]# ./splunk start
```






```
# create splunk container  帳密 admin / admin
docker run -d -p 8000:8000 -e "SPLUNK_START_ARGS=--accept-license" -e "SPLUNK_PASSWORD=admin"  -p 8088:8088 --name splunk splunk/splunk:latest

#查詢container id
docker container ls
 
#查詢container log 的指令
docker logs <container_id>
```
參考

>*https://medium.com/%E3%84%9A%E5%8C%97%E7%9A%84%E6%89%80%E8%A6%8B%E6%89%80%E8%81%9E/splunk-docker-%E5%AE%89%E8%A3%9D-e740035e70f7

>*https://hub.docker.com/r/splunk/splunk/

```
cd target
java -jar spring-boot-demo-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar 

```


|@Controller|reture view|
|@~RestController|return text|

|@~RequestMapping("/api")||
|@~RequestMapping(value = "/say",method = ~RequestMethod.GET)||
|@~PostMapping("/say")||
|@~GetMapping("/say")||

|@~ResponseBody|搭配@Controller使用返回文字 or Restful data(json)|

*網頁樣板
```
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
    <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-thymeleaf</artifactId>
</dependency>
```






sprint goal

2015.06.06
目標:【登入到吃角子老虎】介面，並可以操作基本功能->未完成

!!缺失
----
*組跟組之間的溝通流程
*沒有測試以及完成標準
*發現有缺少的story
*流程卡住無法移動
*任務優先順序不夠明確，有時候要先做完其中一個才能完成另一個
*故事描述不夠明確，故事越切越大
```
【修正】
*PO需控制流程，指派較空閒team去測試
*user story 須註明前後順序
*WIP增加到7
*各組派人確認之間串接流程
ross group planning
split by group,detine AC ->verify by PO
```
!!優點
---
*各組溝通已是常態
*STORY拆分更熟練
*WIP的練習
*開始習慣紀錄開發過程

|!支援DB|~MySQL,Oracle,~PostgreSQL,IBM,DB2,Microsoft SQL Server<br>,Microsoft Access,Sybase,Java DB (Derby)<br>,Firebird (Interbase),Derby(~JavaDB),SQLite,Mimer,HSQLDB<br>,H2,IBM,Informix,Teradata,SAP MAX DB,Cache,Ingres,Linter<br>,Vertica,ODBC,JDBC,~MongoDB,Cassandra|

!!*''免費憑證''
*Let’s Encrypt 
>https://free.com.tw/alwaysonssl/
*~AlwaysOnSSL
>https://free.com.tw/alwaysonssl/
----
*為何HTTPS憑證有貴有便宜還更可以免費？讓我們從CA原理開始講起
>https://progressbar.tw/posts/98
----

|驗證方式|申請門檻|安全等級|價位|坊間名稱|h
|延伸驗證<br>Extended Validation (EV)|高	|高|高|EV|
|機構驗證<br>Organization Validation|中|中|中|企業版... / 企業識別...|
|網域驗證<br>Domain Validation|低|低|低|域名型... / Rapid... / Instant... / 專業版|
<br>

|加密強度|對加密強度影響|安全等級|價位|坊間名稱|h
|SGC<br>(Server Gated Cryptography) |強制達128-bit以上|較高|較高|SGC / 強制版 / 強制高加密|
|非SGC|無影響|||(其他)|
<br>
*SSL憑證上會有主旨名稱 (Subject Name) ，一般就是對應實際伺服器的完整網域名稱 (FQDN) ，也就是傳統一對一的方式；後來因應例如像郵件伺服器這種一個服務同時有多種命名方式 (對外採用domain name，在公司內部採用虛擬IP或是視窗環境的電腦名稱) 的需求，又出現了可以在一張憑證上置入多個主旨別名 (Subject Alternative Name, SAN)的產品，而這些SAN可以分屬不同網域，主要使用在整合通訊服務上 (Unified Communication, UC)，所以又稱為 SAN 憑證 或 UC 憑證。
*還有一種一對多的SSL憑證則是可以用一張憑證對應同一網域下的所有 FQDN，例如：＊.company.com 的憑證可以使用於 www.company.com、mail.company.com、forum.company.com.....，這種特殊憑證稱為 Wildcard 或是萬用憑證，主要是可以簡化同時有很多SSL需求下的管理工作。

|對應主旨名稱數量|對應數量|價位|坊間名稱|h
|一對一|一個|||
|不同網域一對多<br>(SAN/UC)|有限個|以SAN數量計價|SAN... / UC... / 整合通訊 / 多域名 / 聯合通訊|
|同網域下一對多<br>(Wildcard)|不限數量<br>(仍須視授權方式而定)|較高|wildcard... / 萬用... / 多子網域通用... / cloud...|







*明辨STUN/TURN協定　輕鬆跨越NAT建立連線
>https://www.netadmin.com.tw/netadmin/zh-tw/technology/9989E77427114150AEAF3B198FA0DF19






*安裝~PackageControl
*https://packagecontrol.io/installation
>view > show console 貼上
>安裝完重啟 > tools > Command Palette.. >輸入package control...有東西就是安裝完成
```
import urllib.request,os,hashlib; h = '2915d1851351e5ee549c20394736b442' + '8bc59f460fa1548d1514676163dafc88'; pf = 'Package Control.sublime-package'; ipp = sublime.installed_packages_path(); urllib.request.install_opener( urllib.request.build_opener( urllib.request.ProxyHandler()) ); by = urllib.request.urlopen( 'http://packagecontrol.io/' + pf.replace(' ', '%20')).read(); dh = hashlib.sha256(by).hexdigest(); print('Error validating download (got %s instead of %s), please try manual install' % (dh, h)) if dh != h else open(os.path.join( ipp, pf), 'wb' ).write(by)
```
*安裝emmet & convertToUTF8
>tools > Command Palette.. ``CMD +shift+P`` or `` control + shift + P ``
>install Pakage
>emmet
*安裝外掛
```
emmet
convertToUTF8
```
*快速鍵
|!Tab|說明|h
|Control(CMD) + 加減號|放大縮小|
*快速選擇檔案格式
>tools > Command Palette.. ``CMD +shift+P`` or `` control + shift + P ``
>輸入格式 ex.html ``選擇Set Syntax:HTML ``
>輸入格式 ex.css ``選擇Set Syntax:CSS``
*代碼產生快捷鍵 + tab
>``#``:id
>``.``:class
>``>``:下一層
>``+``:同一層
>``*``:重複產生數量
*!Tab (html5板模，需在右下角選擇html)
```
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
	<meta charset="UTF-8">
	<title>Document</title>
</head>
<body>
	
</body>
</html>
```
*``div#wrapper.a.b``
```
<div id="wrapper" class="a b"></div>
</body>
```
*``oi>li*3``
```
<oi>
	<li></li>
	<li></li>
	<li></li>
</oi>
```
*ul.products-list>li*3>a>h2+span
```
	<ul class="products-list">
		<li><a href="">
				<h2></h2>
				<span></span>
			</a>
                </li>
		<li><a href="">
				<h2></h2>
				<span></span>
			</a>
                 </li>
		<li><a href="">
				<h2></h2>
				<span></span>
			</a>
                 </li>
	</ul>
```
*快速選擇檔案格式
>tools > Command Palette.. ``CMD +shift+P`` or `` control + shift + P ``
>輸入格式 ex.html ``選擇Set Syntax:HTML ``
>輸入格式 ex.css ``選擇Set Syntax:CSS``












*一步一腳印的 iOS App 上架和更新流程

四種字串比較的方法

```
import Foundation
Var lyric = "能不能繼續,對我哭,對我笑, 對我好。"
```

*包含
```
If lyric.contains("對我笑"){
}
```
*開頭
```
If lyric.hasPrefix("能不能"){
}
```
*結尾
```
If lyric.hasSuffix("對我好"){
}
```
*相等
```
If lyric.contains("能不能繼續,對我哭,對我笑, 對我好。"){
}
```

*如何抉擇 Apple 開發者帳號的類型？
*https://developer.apple.com/support/compare-memberships/
*申請iOS開發者帳號(Developer Account)&鄧白氏(DUNS)

*手機儲存文件會儲存於sanbox之中，有三種類型
>document
>setting
>tmp






*簡單版的分類:分成 ''5'' 種:
|!~ViewControllers |view controller 相關的檔案|
|!Views |畫面相關的檔案，比方自訂的 cell 類別|
|!Model |資料相關的檔案|
|Other controllers:<br>其它 controller，主要有 ''model controller'' & ''helper controller'' 兩種|<|
|(1) ''model controller''|負責控制 model，比方 Notes App 裡可用 ~NoteController 控制 note 的相關功能|
|(2) ''helper controller''|負責某個特別的功能，比方負責網路功能的 ''~NetworkController''|
|!~AppDelegate & Main.storyboard |單獨放在最外層|
[img width=400 [|img/2019/swift_package_01.jpeg]]

*複雜版的分類: 8 種:
#View controllers
#Views
#Model
#Model controllers
#Other controllers
#Protocols
#Extensions
#Resources ( 裡頭包含 storyboards，extensions，frameworks 等)

*[[iOS App 的 Xcode 專案如何分類檔案(project organization)|https://medium.com/%E5%BD%BC%E5%BE%97%E6%BD%98%E7%9A%84-swift-ios-app-%E9%96%8B%E7%99%BC%E5%95%8F%E9%A1%8C%E8%A7%A3%E7%AD%94%E9%9B%86/ios-app-%E7%9A%84-xcode-%E5%B0%88%E6%A1%88%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E5%88%86%E9%A1%9E%E6%AA%94%E6%A1%88-project-organization-e18d6fb5060a]]






*權限說明請參考[[Swift_Cocoa_Keys權限說明]]
*確認權限範例
```javascript
// 1. 還沒有詢問過用戶以獲得權限
    if CLLocationManager.authorizationStatus() == .NotDetermined {
        locationManager.requestAlwaysAuthorization()
    }
    // 2. 用戶不同意
    else if CLLocationManager.authorizationStatus() == .Denied {
        showAlert("Location services were previously denied. Please enable location services for this app in Settings.")
    }
    // 3. 用戶已經同意
    else if CLLocationManager.authorizationStatus() == .AuthorizedAlways {
        locationManager.startUpdatingLocation()
    }
```






```java
 UIView.animate(withDuration: 15, animations: {
                bgImage.center.x = bgImage.center.x + (bgImage.image?.size.width)! - (self.window?.frame.width)!
})
```
```java
let bgImage = UIImageView()
        bgImage.image = UIImage(named: "desktop_sky")
        bgImage.frame = CGRect(x: 0, y: 0, width: (bgImage.image?.size.width)!
            , height: (bgImage.image?.size.height)!)
        
        view!.addSubview(bgImage)
        view!.sendSubviewToBack(bgImage)
        
        UIView.animate(withDuration: 15, animations: {
            
            bgImage.center.x = bgImage.center.x - (bgImage.image?.size.width)! + (self.view?.frame.width)!
            
        }, completion: {(finish) in
            UIView.animate(withDuration: 15, animations: {
                bgImage.center.x = bgImage.center.x + (bgImage.image?.size.width)! - (self.view?.frame.width)!
            })
            
        })
```

*利用 ~UIImageView 實現多張圖片連續播放的動畫
>[[url|https://medium.com/%E5%BD%BC%E5%BE%97%E6%BD%98%E7%9A%84-swift-ios-app-%E9%96%8B%E7%99%BC%E5%95%8F%E9%A1%8C%E8%A7%A3%E7%AD%94%E9%9B%86/%E5%88%A9%E7%94%A8-uiimageview-%E6%92%AD%E6%94%BE%E5%8B%95%E7%95%AB-f48959b6882a]]






```javascript
//初始化可給型別
var myArray = [Int]()
myArray.append(11)
print(myArray)      //[11]

myArray.append(37)
print(myArray)      //[11, 37]

myArray.append(66)
print(myArray)      //[11, 37, 66]

myArray.append(18)
print(myArray)      //[11, 37, 66, 18]

//移除元素會回傳該元素內容
var removedata = myArray.remove(at: 0)
print(removedata)   //11
print(myArray)      //[37, 66, 18]

//排序
myArray.sort()
print(myArray)      //[18, 37, 66]

//初始化可直接賦值
var stringArray = ["Amy","Sam","Jhon"]
//陣列可存放混合類型物件
var mixArray = [2,"Good",false,11.3] as Any

```






*如何利用 Core Bluetooth 製作一個監控心率 App
*https://www.appcoda.com.tw/core-bluetooth/

https://cms.35g.tw/coding/%E8%97%8D%E7%89%99-ble-corebluetooth-%E5%88%9D%E6%8E%A2/






[img[./img/2020/20200725_swift_closure.png]]

*當把方法當參數傳入另一方法時
```javascript
func caculater(a:Int,b:Int,operation:(Int,Int)->Int)->Int{
    return operation(a,b)
}
func add(a:Int,b:Int)->Int{
    return a + b
}
func multiply(a:Int,b:Int)->Int{
    return a * b
}

print(caculater(a: 3, b: 5, operation: add))
//8
print(caculater(a: 3, b: 5, operation: multiply))
//15
```
*如果不想另外寫方法，就直接把方法內容寫入參數(匿名方法)
>移除function名稱，將原本內容的大括弧改成"in"
```javascript
caculater(a: 3, b: 5, operation: {
    (a:Int,b:Int)->Int in
        return a * b
})
```
*簡化($0,$1...代表輸入參數)，如果只有一行``return``可省略
```javascript
caculater(a: 3, b: 5, operation:{ $0 * $1 })
```
*再簡化
>如果傳入function是最後一個參數，可用大括弧加在函式最後面，並取消小括弧最後一個傳入的參數
```javascript
caculater(a: 3, b: 5){ $0 * $1 }
```
*應用，array的map
```javascript
let arrays = [3,5,7,9]
print(arrays)
//[3, 5, 7, 9]
print(arrays.map({$0+1}))
//[4, 6, 8, 10]
print(arrays.map({"\($0)"}))
//["3", "5", "7", "9"]
```






*修改檔案 info.plist
*https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/General/Reference/InfoPlistKeyReference/Articles/CocoaKeys.html
----
*MKMap - 地圖存取使用者位置
>*Privacy — Location When In Use Usage Description
>*Privacy — Location Always and When In Use Usage Description
>使用：locationManager.requestWhenInUseAuthorization()

*Http request allow - 訪問Http
>*App Transport Security Settings
>**Allow Arbitrary Loads -> Yes






*cocoapods:它是一種支援 Swift 和 Objective-C 程式開發的第三方庫資源相依性管理工具
*install
```bash
#預設安裝
$ sudo gem install cocoapods
#如果要更改安裝位置，使用參數-n
$ sudo gem install -n /usr/local/bin cocoapods
```
*設置cocoapods
```bash
$ pod setup --verbose
```
*使用終端機，切換到專案目錄下產生Podfile檔
``如果出現錯誤，請關掉xcode再執行``

```
# cd ~/xcode_workspace/CocoapodsDemo
# pod init
```
*修改Podfile，加入要安裝的第三方套件設定
```shell
# Pods for CocoapodsDemo
  pod 'Alamofire'
  pod 'SwiftyJSON'
  pod 'SVProgressHUD'
```
*存檔離開後安裝
```
# pod install
```
----
*如果使用cocoapods app(優點：產生pod檔無需關閉xcode)
>直接【file】->【New Podfile from xcode project】->選取project檔
>在在app修改pod檔，按右上角【install】即可安裝
[img[img/2019/cocoapods_app_install_lib.png]]

----
!!''刪除cocoapods''
*找出安裝哪些套件
```shell
#gem list --local | grep cocoapods
```
*可能找到下面套件
```
cocoapods (0.27.1, 0.20.2)
cocoapods-core (0.27.1, 0.20.2)
cocoapods-downloader (0.2.0, 0.1.2)
```
*刪除
```
#sudo gem uninstall cocoapods
#sudo gem uninstall cocoapods-core
#sudo gem uninstall cocoapods-downloader
```






```javascript
//ＣoreData寫入
let appDelegate = UIApplication.shared.delegate as! AppDelegate
let context = appDelegate.persistentContainer.viewContext
let user = Users(context:context)

user.username = "Tom"
user.password = "12345678"
user.age = 18
do{
    try context.save()
    print("data is save")
}catch{
    print("something is wrong!!")
}
```
*讀出
```javascript
//CoreData讀出
let fetchRequest =NSFetchRequest<Users>(entityName: "Users")
do{
    var users :[Users] = []
    users  = try context.fetch( fetchRequest)
    
    //顯示完整資料（不是data: <fault>）
    fetchRequest.returnsObjectsAsFaults = false
    print(users)
    
    for user in users{
        print("username:\t\(user.username!)")
        print("password:\t\(user.password!)")
        print("age:\t\t\(user.age)")
    }
    //            username:    Sam
    //            password:    12345678
    //            age:         18 

    //            username:    Tom
    //            password:    12345678
    //            age:         18
    
}catch{
    print("something is wrong!!")
}
```

*coredata
>https://developer.apple.com/documentation/coredata
*core_data_stack
>https://developer.apple.com/documentation/coredata/setting_up_a_core_data_stack






*類似 java 的 interface (protocol -> interface 關鍵字)
```
protocol PageBDelegate {
func pageA(_ pageB: PageB, didSelectData data: String)
}
```
*https://www.appcoda.com.tw/swift-delegates/
```
劍橋字典 (Cambridge dictionary) 定義的 “delegate” 是表示「將特定的工作、職責、權利等給予別人，讓他們為你完成。」韋伯字典 (Merriam-Webster dictionary) 定義的 “delegation” 是指「授權給另一方行事的行為」。

簡而言之，「Delegation 是一種設計模式，使 class 和 structure 能夠將其某些職責交給（或委託）其他類型的物件。」
```






*[[Swift Design Pattern 系列教程 #1：工廠方法模式 (Factory Method) 與單例模式 (Singleton)|https://www.appcoda.com.tw/design-pattern-creational/]]
*[[Swift Design Pattern 系列教程 #2：觀察者模式 (Observer) 與備忘錄模式 (Memento)|https://www.appcoda.com.tw/design-pattern-behavioral/]]
*[[Swift Design Pattern 系列教程 #3：外觀模式 (Facade) 與轉接器模式 (Adapter)|https://www.appcoda.com.tw/tag/design-pattern/]]






```javascript
var dictoinary = ["AppleSystem":"ios","AppleLanguage":"swift"]
print(dictoinary)
//["AppleSystem": "ios", "AppleLanguage": "swift"]
print(dictoinary["AppleSystem"]!)
//ios
```
```javascript
for key in dictoinary.keys{
    print("keys:\(key)")
}
//keys:AppleSystem
//keys:AppleLanguage

for value in dictoinary.values{
    print("value:\(value)")
}
//value:ios
//value:swift

for value in dictoinary{
    print("key:\(value.0),value:\(value.1)")
}
//key:AppleSystem,value:ios
//key:AppleLanguage,value:swift
```
```javascript
//add data
dictoinary["username"] = "Ken"
print(dictoinary)
//["AppleLanguage": "swift", "username": "Ken", "AppleSystem": "ios"]

//remove data for key
dictoinary.removeValue(forKey: "username")
print(dictoinary)
//["AppleLanguage": "swift", "AppleSystem": "ios"]
```
```javascript
//計算多少組資料
dictoinary.count
```
```javascript
//array init
var array_define:[String] = []
//dictionary init
var dictionary_define = [String:String]()
```






```javascript
enum Movement{
	case Left
	case Right
	case Top
	case Bottom
}
```
```javascript
enum WEATHER_ICON:String {
    case CLOUDS    = "clouds"
    case MIST      = ":mist"
    case RAIN      = ":rain"
    case SNOW      = ":snow"
    case SUNNY     = "sunny"
    case THUNERSTOM = "thunderstorm"
}
```
```javascript
enum Genre {
   case animated, action, romance, documentary, biography,
thriller
}
struct Movie {
   var name: String
   var releaseYear: Int
   var genre: Genre
}
let loveMovie = Movie(name: “Finding Dory”, releaseYear: 2016, genre: .animated)
```






*https://www.appcoda.com.tw/swift-error-handling/
<br>

*定義錯誤enum
```java
enum GoAfterGirlError:Error {
    case poorProblem
    case tooYoungProblem
    case notAquariusProblem
    case falseHeartProblem
}
```
*會拋錯誤的function 要加 ''throws''
```java
func goAfterAngelababy(money:Int, age:Int) throws {
    
    if money > 10000 else {
        throw GoAfterGirlError.poorProblem
    }
        
    if age > 18 else {
        throw GoAfterGirlError.tooYoungProblem
    }
        
    print("我追到 Angelababy 了!")
}
```
*使用do catch + try 包覆錯誤

```java
@IBAction func buttonPressed(_ sender: UIButton)  {
        do {
            try goAfterAngelababy(money: 100, age: 25)
            try goAfterVivian(money: 100, age: 25)
            print("為了給她們幸福，我要白天寫 iOS，晚上寫 Android")
        }
        catch {
            print("我知道她們不愛我，她的眼神，說出她的心。")
        }
        print("不管有沒有追到，我都要繼續寫 iOS App")
}
```

*如果不想加 do catch ，直接加 ``try?``
```java
@IBAction func buttonPressed(_ sender: UIButton)  {
        if (try? goAfterAngelababy(money: 100, age: 25)) == nil {
            print("追 Angelababy 失敗")
        }
                
        if (try? goAfterVivian(money: 100, age: 25)) == nil {
            print("追 Vivian 失敗")
        }
                
        print("不管有沒有追到，我都要繼續學 Swift。女朋友只是一時，Swift 卻是一輩子。")
}
```






*讓 closure 在 function 外繼續使用的 @escaping
*https://medium.com/%E5%BD%BC%E5%BE%97%E6%BD%98%E7%9A%84-swift-ios-app-%E9%96%8B%E7%99%BC%E5%95%8F%E9%A1%8C%E8%A7%A3%E7%AD%94%E9%9B%86/%E8%AE%93-closure-%E5%9C%A8-function-%E5%A4%96%E7%B9%BC%E7%BA%8C%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E7%9A%84-escaping-40d50b17f75b
```javascript
class Baby {
    var name = "peter"
    var favoriteActivity: (() -> ())!
    func outsideActivity(activity: @escaping () -> ()) {
        activity()
        favoriteActivity = activity
    }
}
var cuteBaby = Baby()
cuteBaby.outsideActivity {
    print("打桌球")
}
cuteBaby.favoriteActivity()
```






```javascript
var names = ["ken","May","Jhon","Sam"]
for name in names{
    print("name:\(name)")
}
//name:ken
//name:May
//name:Jhon
//name:Sam
```
```javascript
var scopes = [50,60,33,45,99]
for (index,value) in scopes.enumerated(){
    print("index:\(index),value\(value)")
}
//index:0,value50
//index:1,value60
//index:2,value33
//index:3,value45
//index:4,value99

```
```javascript
for i in 1...3{
    print(i)
}
//1
//2
//3
```
```javascript
//1 加到 1000(偶數)
var result:Int = 0;
for i in 1...1000 where i%2 == 0{
        result = result + i
}
print(result)
//250500

```







*如果沒有回傳值
```
func <名稱>(參數:a,參數:b){
  
}
```
*如果有回傳值
```
func <名稱>(參數:a,參數:b)-><回傳值類型>{
   return <回傳值>
}
```
```
func caculater(a:Int,b:Int)->Int{
    return a * b
}
print(caculater(a: 3, b: 7))
//21
```






*https://www.jianshu.com/p/737233208d40






*使用 ``private`` 封裝age，禁止``直接讀取修改``用自訂方法讀取
```
class Woman {
   var name = "penny"
   private var age = 18
   func intro() {
  print("我的名字是\(name)，我的年齡是\(age)")
   }
}
```
*private(set) var age 表示 age 的 ''setter'' 權限為 ``private``，但 ''getter'' 權限維持預設的 ``internal``
```javascript
class Woman {
   var name = "penny"
   private(set) var age = 18
   func getOlder() {
      age = age + 1
   }
}
```
*同時設定 getter setter 權限
*getter -> public (不用特地寫)
*setter -> private
```javascript
public class Woman {
   var name = "penny"
   public private(set) var age = 18
   func getOlder() {
      age = age + 1
   }
}
```
*setter 的權限不能比 getter 高
>像 getter 是 internal，setter 是 public 將產生錯誤。






*UIVIEW實作 ~UITextFieldDelegate
```java
class MainViewController: UIViewController,UITextFieldDelegate {
   }
```
*實作方法
```java
override func touchesBegan(_ touches: Set<UITouch>, with event: UIEvent?) {
        view.endEditing(true)
    }
    
    func textFieldShouldReturn(_ textField: UITextField) -> Bool {
        textMainInput.resignFirstResponder()
        return true
    }
```

<br>
*nil 賦值 ''if let'' {變數} = 值 {}

```javascript
var girlFriend:String? = "Wendy"
if let girlFriend = girlFriend {
    let message = "可愛的" + girlFriend;
}else{
    var message = "醒醒吧！你沒有女朋友";
}
```
```javascript
if let price = price,let percent = percent {
    let tip = price * percent / 100;
}
```
*nil 賦值 ``??``
```javascript
var girlFriend:String? = "Wendy" 
var girlFriendName = girlFriend ??  "Angelababy
```

*動畫
```javascript
//圓角半徑
blackView.layer.cornerRadius = 30
//剪裁超出父視圖範圍的子視圖部分
blackView.mask?.clipsToBounds = true

//縮放大小
self.blackView.transform = CGAffineTransform(scaleX: 300, y: 300)
//位置移動
self.loginView.transform =CGAffineTransform(translationX: 0, y: -500)
//旋轉180
self.btnUp.transform = CGAffineTransform(rotationAngle: .pi)
```
*復原
```
self.btnUp.transform = CGAffineTransform.identity
```







```java
 //儲存
UserDefaults.standard.set("Jack", forKey: "username")
        
//取出
let username = UserDefaults.standard.object(forKey: "username")
if let username = username as? String{
            print("\(username)")
}
        
      
```
```java
  //儲存
let nameArray = ["Jack","Blue","Sam"]
UserDefaults.standard.set(nameArray,forKey: "nameArray")
        
//取出
if let nameArray = nameArray as? NSArray{
            print("\(nameArray)")
}
```






*viewDidLoad
>Controller 的視圖被載入記憶體後 被呼叫。簡單來說，即是第一個載入的方法。
*viewDidAppear
>Apple 將其定義為「通知 View Controller 視圖已經被加進視圖階層裡。」換句話說，就是當畫面呈現在使用者眼前時，就呼叫這個方法
>``viewDidAppear`` 與`` viewDidLoad ``的不同之處，在於每次進入畫面時 ``viewDidAppear``就會被呼叫，而 ``viewDidLoad`` 只會在 App 加載時被呼叫``一次``。
* viewWillDisappear

*https://www.appcoda.com.tw/view-controller-lifecycle/






|方式|是否可跨app|h
|segue||
|[[delegate|Swift_delegate]]| |
|[[CoreData|Swift_CoreData]]||
|雲端(api / firebase)| 可 |
|static class / object||






Swift 擁有類似C# 的getter,setter屬性聲明語法：

可以只寫get 此時Property 為''read only''

```javascript
var num1: Int = 1
var num2: Int = 2
var sum: Int {
    get {
        return num1 + num2
    }
    set {
        num2 = newValue - num1
    }
}
```
但是，Swift還另有``willSet``和``didSet``行為。它們分別在調用setter``之前``和``之後``被調用。

```java
import Foundation
class People : NSObject
{
    // 普通屬性 
    var firstName:String = "" 
    var lastName:String   = "" 
    var nickName:String   = ""
    
    // 計算屬性
    var fullName:String
    {
        get
        {
            return nickName + "  " + firstName + "  " + lastName
        }
    }
    
    // 帶屬性監視器的普通屬性 
    var age:Int = 0
    {
        // 我們需要在age屬性變化前做點什麼
        willSet
        {
            println( " Will set an new value \(newValue) to age " )
        }
        // 我們需要在age屬性發生變化後，更新一下nickName這個屬性
        didSet
        {
            println( " age filed changed form \(oldValue) to \(age) " )
             if age< 10
            {
                nickName = " Little " 
            } else
            {
                nickName = " Big "
            }
        }
    }
    
    func toString() -> String
    {
        return " Full Name: \(fullName) " + " , Age: \(age) "
    }
    
}

var me = People()
me.firstName = " Zhang " 
me.lastName   = " San " 
me.age = 20

println(me.toString())

/* 程序輸出
Will set an new value 20 to age
age filed changed form 0 to 20
Full Name: Big Zhang San , Age: 20
*/
```






```javascript
var power_on:Bool = true

power_on.toggle()
print(power_on)  //false
power_on.toggle()
print(power_on)  //true
```






```
$:/tags/SideBar
```












維基資料夾的子資料夾裡的任何檔案，都將通過路由 `\files\<uri-encoded-filename>` 提供。例如：http://127.0.0.1:8080/files/Motovun%20Jack.jpg

這對於發佈不想併入主維基的大型檔 (PDFs、視頻、大圖像等) 非常有用。

靜態檔可以直接被引用:

* `[ext[./files/a-big-document.pdf]]` - 建立一個 PDF 鏈接
* `[img[./files/a-big-image.png]]` - 嵌入一個圖像

或者，''_canonical_uri'' 欄位可用於將檔引用為[[外部條目|ExternalImages]]。






[[TiddlyWiki_table]]<br>

! Basics

TiddlyWiki5 formats tables using vertical bar characters like so:

```
|!Cell1 |!Cell2 |
|Cell3 |Cell3 |
```

Exclamation marks are used to indicate header cells. The example renders as:

|!Cell1 |!Cell2 |
|Cell3 |Cell3 |

! Cell Alignment

Table cell alignment is controlled by inserting space characters before and/or after the cell content. For example:

```
|Left aligned content |
| Right aligned content|
| Centred content |
|+++ a very wide column so we can see the alignment +++|
```

The example renders as:

|Left aligned content |
| Right aligned content|
| Centred content |
|+++ a very wide column so we can see the alignment +++|

! Cell vertical Alignment

Vertical alignment of cells is done by inserting either a `^` for top alignment or a `,` for bottom alignment as the first character of a cell. The normal horizontal alignment is still possible. For example:

```
|^top left |^ top center |^ top right|
|middle left | middle center | middle right|
|,bottom left |, bottom center |, bottom right|
```

The example renders as:

| :: | ::::::::::::::::::::::::::: | ::::::::::::::::::::::::::: | ::::::::::::::::::::::::::: | :: |
| ::<br>:: |^top left |^ top center |^ top right| ::<br>:: |
| ::<br>:: |middle left | middle center | middle right| ::<br>:: |
| ::<br>:: |,bottom left |, bottom center |, bottom right| ::<br>:: |
| :: | ::::::::::::::::::::::::::: | ::::::::::::::::::::::::::: | ::::::::::::::::::::::::::: | :: |

If you need to have a `^`or a `,` as the first character of a left aligned cell, you can use HTML escaping:

| `^` | &amp;#94; |
| `,` | &amp;#44; |

! Cell Merging

To merge a table cell with the one above, use the special cell text `~`. To merge a cell with the one to its left use the text `<`. To merge one to its right use `>`. For example:

```
|Cell1 |Cell2 |Cell3 |Cell4 |
|Cell5 |Cell6 |Cell7 |<|
|Cell5 |~|Cell7 |Cell8 |
|>|Cell9 |Cell10 |Cell11 |
```

Renders as:

|Cell1 |Cell2 |Cell3 |Cell4 |
|Cell5 |Cell6 |Cell7 |<|
|Cell5 |~|Cell7 |Cell8 |
|>|Cell9 |Cell10 |Cell11 |

! Table Classes, Captions, Headers and Footers

Table CSS classes, captions, headers and footers can be specified as special pseudo-rows. The following example:

* assigns the CSS classes "myclass" and "anotherClass" to the table
* gives the table the caption "This is a caption"
* adds a header row of cells with the text "Header"
* adds a footer row of cells with the text "Footer"

```
|myclass anotherClass|k
|This is a caption |c
|Cell1 |Cell2 |
|Cell3 |Cell3 |
|Header|Header|h
|Footer|Footer|f
```

Renders as:

|myclass anotherClass|k
|This is a caption |c
|Cell1 |Cell2 |
|Cell3 |Cell3 |
|Header|Header|h
|Footer|Footer|f







|!head|!row|
| <div class="pink f-ghostwhite">pink</div> |plain|

修改
$:/styles/tablecell

```css
/* 背景顏色 */
.pink{
background-color: pink;
margin: -1px -7px;
padding: 1x 7px;
}

/* 文字顏色 */
.f-ghostwhite{
color: ghostwhite
}

```







http://tiddlywiki.com/static/WikiText.html

***http://www.cnblogs.com/xishuai/p/macos-use-vagrant-with-virtualbox.html

**Mac OSX+~VirtualBox+Vagrant+CentOS初体验
***https://www.jianshu.com/p/7747c31012f8
